results.name: SingChina
results.description: 这是区块链与竞猜游戏的一个尝试, 本游戏选择人气很高的好声音做为竞猜对象. 参与者投出他认为最终的冠
results.fullDescription: 这是区块链与竞猜游戏的一个尝试, 本游戏选择人气很高的好声音做为竞猜对象. 参与者投出他认为最终的冠军人选, 在比赛结束后. 再由参与者投票确认最终的冠军, 冠军产生后, 所有猜中的人获得奖金. 同时对真实汇报冠军的人做出奖励,而对虚假者做出惩罚. This is an attempt at the blockchain and quiz game. This game selects high popularity show 'Sing!China' as a quiz. The participants buy tickets for the candidate who may be the future champion, when the game is over,all the participants need to vote who is the real champion, after the champion is born. all the guessed people split the reward. At the same time, reward the one who reporting true champion and punish the false.

results.name: Ethertote
results.description: Ethertote is a skill-based trading platform that a
results.fullDescription: Ethertote is a skill-based trading platform that allows traders to trade Ethereum on leading global crypto-currencies over a fixed period of time. A "winning" crypto is determined at the end of the fixed period based on overall percentage gain, and winning players who traded on the winning crypto will receive a share of the overall Eth pot. 95% of the pot is distributed back amongst winning players, and the remaining 5% is sent to a "Token Holder Claim" fund to share amongst TOTE token holders.

results.name: Star Bit
results.description: STAR BIT provides high convenience and excellent u
results.fullDescription: STAR BIT provides high convenience and excellent user experience compatible with conventional centralized exchanges, while ensuring the high-level security and privacy protection in its decentralized trades. Users are allowed to launch trades on our platform by using local wallets such as MetaMask or hardware wallets such as Ledger Wallet. This design ensures that only users are able to access the private key of their own wallet. It also means that users literally have full control over their cryptocurrency. Everything we did is to give our users a trustworthy, fast and secure cryptocurrency investing experience.

results.description: Keno game is the ancient basic lottery game. To en
results.fullDescription: Keno game is the ancient basic lottery game. To enter the lottery, you need to buy a ticket. Each transaction is a ticket. After total ticket size is reached, a lucky number is revealed by the contract and sends 90% of total ETH in the contract to the winner transaction owner. Luckyether contracts are decentralized, the winner is determined randomly by the contract.

results.name: Ethereum Alarm Clock
results.description: The Ethereum Alarm Clock is a service that allows
results.fullDescription: The Ethereum Alarm Clock is a service that allows scheduling transactions to be executed at a later time on the ethereum blockchain. This is accomplished by specifying all of the details for the transaction you wish to send, as well as providing up-front payment for gas costs, allowing your transaction to be executed for you at a later time. The service is completely trustless, meaning that the entire service operates as smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain, with no priviledged access given to any party. The code for this service is open source under the MIT license and can be viewed on the github repository.

results.name: EthPolls
results.description: Online poll voting and statistics suffer the vulne
results.fullDescription: Online poll voting and statistics suffer the vulnerabilities of voting bots, uneducated users who cast votes and a centralized third party hosting the vote. A real world example of these issues is on many exchanges. Exchanges often hold votes in which they allow users to vote on which coins they want as a listed asset on the exchange. The coin with the most votes wins. More often then not, coin developers/project leaders pay for voting bots or dishonestly encourage the community to vote on their project. Holding votes on a blockchain allows for votes to be protected from voting bots via Ethereum's protocol (specifically gas transaction fees), this also eliminates the incentive for uneducated users to vote since each vote will cost a small amount of Ether and each voter can only vote once. EthPolls removes the third party and ensures additional security and honesty regarding votes.

results.fullDescription: What is EtherWheels? EtherWheels is a game centered around collectible cars, bikes, trucks and many more vehicles that you can buy, sell and enter into races! Each vehicle in your garage is one-of-a-kind and 100% owned by you; it cannot be replicated, taken away, or destroyed. How does it work? EtherWheels is built on blockchain technology. results.name: 牛熊争霸
results.description: Game rules: The game is divided into two groups: t
results.fullDescription: Game rules: The game is divided into two groups: the Bulls team and the Bears 2 team; Game draw basis: According to the last digit of the Hash value of the lottery height block as the basis for the draw, if the last bit value is 0-8, the Bulls team wins. If the last digit is 9-f, then the Bear 2 team wins, which is subject to the actual block packing. Game prize pool description: Each round of the game prize pool is all bets ETH for this round, 5% of the current round of prize pools as game fees and service fees, all as the draw amount. Award amount = lottery amount * (bet bet / bet team total round bet) Game details: 1, the game height is 100 per game, the actual lottery height is 100-10 blocks, and the last 10 blocks are normal and cannot participate in the purchase. At this time, the bet will be transferred directly to the balance of the game account. The 10 blocks will become the waiting period. You will need to wait for the next round after the end of the round. 2. Meet the draw request, but the total prize pool is less than 3ETH. a lottery height, and so on, until the minimum lottery amount is met; 3. If the draw request is met, but the team is not bet, the beating team will divide the prize pool; 4. During the waiting period, if the total amount of the draw does not meet the requirements, you can participate. Purchase, and the draw height will be raised to the next draw height, and so on, until the draw requirements are met. Bet Limit: Minimum bet 0.01 ETH, maximum bet 100 ETH.

results.fullDescription: The first Crowdsurance DApp based on ERC721 Smart Token. The Luggage Crowdsurance ERC721 smart contract unites people in groups to protect their luggage during the flights. Person can become a part of Crowdsurance joining a pool with ETH or RST. Thanks to ERC721 Smart Token technology Luggage Crowdsurance Token (LCST) can be placed in Metamask wallet. To open risk coverage period LCST Token must be activated. Before activation the token can be transfered to another account. The reimbursement option is regulatedby the smart contract. The Luggage Crowdsurance Smart Contract will work on an application and will put 5 independent experts from the RST tokenholders to make a decision. Smart Contract gives 48 hours to make it, but the process takes 30 minutes.

It is the second marketplace live on the network. Open market to buy and sell ENS names, hosted on IPFS and fully open source written in Clojure and Solidity.

results.name: RCN Network
results.description: RCN is an open-source global credit network that connects lenders, borrowers and originators on the blockchain to create borderless loan markets.
results.fullDescription:
RCN is an open-source global credit network that connects lenders, borrowers and originators on the blockchain to create frictionless, transparent and borderless loan markets.

The RCN Credit Marketplace is a proprietary Decentralized Application (dApp) that allows users to access the RCN protocol and connect with its features. By combining digital lending and borrowing tools with all the transparency and security of the blockchain, the RCN Credit Marketplace enables creditors to lend Decentralized Finance (DeFi) and Centralized Finance (CeFi) loans, borrow Peer-To-Peer (P2P) loans and manage everything in one place.

RCN is powered by its own open-source blockchain lending and borrowing protocol, which in turn runs on the Ethereum network. Composed by a modular set of smart-contracts, the protocol’s current version RCN Protocol v4.0 “Diaspore" allows its users to denominate, collateralize, receive, repay, fund, transfer and collect loans. In addition, it is compatible with a wide variety of Oracles, Loan Types and Backings.

results.fullDescription: FREECELL is a completely transparent, decentralized blockchain game. Each time the player bets, a CELL consisting of 6 digits is randomly generated. When the CELL is exactly equal to the CELL value on the front chain, 60% of the prize pool between the two CELLs can be obtained. The same CELL value on the chain can get 30% of the prize pool amount.When the game is over, the last user can get 90% of the prize pool amount.
